archimate:Capability.name: Trusted Sources / Apps
archimate:Capability.documentation: Trusted Sources are a certified source for catalogued data items, which can be used as the data source for Data Factory components. Data scope is all data – structured and un-structured, therefore covering text, documents, streamed data, clickstream, social media, etc. etc. For the purposes of this solution The following source systems have currently been identified: • EA Telemetry • Met Office Forecasts • Wavenet • Reference Data
